fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
-Place a Bomb at someone's house.
-Detonate your Bombs.
-Once per game, build a specialized bomb.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Once you detonate your bombs, every visitor Is dealt a powerful attack.
-The specialized bomb deals unstoppable attack and also targets the target who had a Bomb placed in his house.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who may oppose you.
